alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 27 at 9:56AM PDT until October 27 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 25 to 32 are expected. * WHERE...Portions of the Klamath River Valley, most of the Shasta Valley, and most of the area south of Mt. Shasta. This includes the cities and communities of Happy Camp, Seiad Valley, Klamath River, Yreka, Montague, Grenada, Gazelle, Weed, Mt. Shasta City, and McCloud. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While the Scott Valley will also see sub- freezing temperatures, they have already experienced a hard freeze and their growing season is over. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County
